name: Onion Story
description:
Haven't heard from your younger brother for a while, you decide to pay him a visit back to the Orphanage in the valley.

Although not everything is as it was years ago, it seems something fishy is going on, the village's onion production changed in a way affecting also the  inhabitants of the town.

Find out the mistery behind Onion Story by talking not only to the townsfolk, but also to the crows as they give you useful hints to help you discover a "power" hidden within yourself. The power to Mind Read.

Use it and discover the secrets of the village, while trying to find out what happened to your brother.

-------

Disclaimer: This game requires a gamepad with analogue triggers in order for the main gameplay mechanic to work.
